purpose: Facilitates in-depth research on any topic by autonomously gathering and synthesizing information into detailed reports.
principle: Utilizes large language models (LLMs) to conduct web scraping and local data analysis, culminating in structured report generation.
reusability: Designed for easy integration with existing research workflows, offering modular components for customization and extension.
limitations: Dependent on the availability and accuracy of online sources; may struggle with real-time updates or rapidly changing topics.
name: gpt-researcher
description: LLM based autonomous agent that conducts deep local and web research on any topic and generates a long report with citations.
highlight: Autonomous research agent that generates comprehensive reports with citations by leveraging LLMs for deep web and local research.
